Node.js OS Info

Descripción

Get basic OS information using the os module


File Template: ❌


Prefix

node:os:info


Scopes

javascript


Snippet de código

import os from 'os';
console.log('Platform:', os.platform());
console.log('CPU Architecture:', os.arch());
console.log('Total Memory:', os.totalmem());
console.log('Free Memory:', os.freemem());
